div.bibl: Chicagoer Arbeiter Zeitung, July 6, 1880. [MILITARY ORGANIZATION DISPLAYS ITS COLORS]

body.p: The Military Organizations marched out this morning with weapons and with colors flying, as previously announced. The streets through which the parade moved, were richly decorated with flags and bunting, and the people appeared in great masses, to witness the march of the magnificent body of military men.
The procession moved to the place of the picnic "Oswald's Grove," corner 52nd and So. Halsted Streets, where the festival will take place to-day.
